data.text: @JuliaDavisNews @TheRickWilson So Putin is going full Howard Hughes....this is going to end well

@saletan @JuliaDavisNews Putin ascribes to the thinking of Aleksandr Dugin who wrote about the destruction of the US via "end of times" means. Nuclear weapons to a cornered psychopath, perhaps on steroids with this philosophy arean important tool to achieve his goal. For him they are not off the table.

@JuliaDavisNews Putin may be in steroids for medical reasons.  Note his new puffy face, rambling disjointed paranoid cognitive style. Sitting so far from people could be because he is immune compromised from steroids.  Dangerous as it makes a dangerous man more impulsive.

@JuliaDavisNews Immunocompromised. He's Very ill and hiding it poorly. He may not have long to live.
If allowed to do so.
@JuliaDavisNews Trapped in his palace, the Mad King melts down
@Orwellspeak @JuliaDavisNews @TheRickWilson And everyone in that room thinks this is all normal? What buffoons
@JuliaDavisNews @wallisweaver The guy who poisons people with airborne poisons is afraid of an airborne virus... go figure 🤔
